title: Many Fed Officials See Need for Half-Point Rate Hikes
itunes:title: Many Fed Officials See Need for Half-Point Rate Hikes
description:
Bloomberg Markets Correspondent Kriti Gupta and Bloomberg News Global Economics and Policy Editor Kathleen Hays recap the minutes of the FOMC March meeting. Bloomberg News Washington Correspondent Annmarie Hordern explains why an ex-oligarch thinks Vladimir Putin believes the war with the west is already underway. Bloomberg News Cross Asset Reporter Vildana Hajric reports from the “Bitcoin 2022” conference in Miami. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green talk about Josh's Businessweek Magazine cover story McCormick Left Bridgewater to Go Full MAGA in Bid for Senate. Ross Gerber, CEO at Geber Kawasaki Wealth Management, discusses investing in Tesla. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at Hightower RDM Financial Group.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.
